findings.title: Improper Reward Calculation
findings.description: The reward of the pool that has the same staking token as the reward token will be slightly lower than what it should be.

findings.title: Unclaimable Locked Rewards
findings.description: A portion of the total $LATTE reward will be locked and unclaimable, causing users to gain less $LATTE than expected.

findings.title: Improper Lock Amount Calculation
findings.description: Less amount of $LATTE will be locked than intended in the developer's portion during the bonus period. The unfair distribution of $LATTE can lead to reputation damage.

findings.title: Unchecked bonusLockUpBps Parameter Value
findings.description: An improper setting of the bonusLockUpBps variable can cause the smart contract to be unusable for the users.

findings.title: Improper Reward Distribution
findings.description: A part of the $LATTE reward could be claimed by a user without any prior token deposited, causing the other investors to gain less $LATTE reward.

findings.title: Design Flaw in massUpdatePools() Function
findings.description: The massUpdatePools() function will eventually be unusable due to excessive gas usage because added pools cannot be removed and the poolInfo.length will continue to grow.

findings.title: Reduced Unlockable Amount for transferAll() Recipient
findings.description: The victim's unlockable amount before the endReleaseBlock is reduced, allowing the attacker to gain an early advantage of $LATTE unlock amount over the victim.

findings.title: Potential Centralized Control of State Variable
findings.description: Critical state variables can be updated any time by the controlling authorities without notifying users.

findings.title: Improper Update of State Variable
findings.description: The miscalculation of user.latteAtLastUserAction can lead to reputation damage when this value is used in the public website.

findings.title: Improper Function Visibility
findings.description: Functions with improper visibility can lead to unintended access and potential security risks.
